data.title: List of Columbia Pictures films
authors: Contributors to The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
data.meta_description: The following is a list of films produced and/or released by Columbia Pictures. It is one of the Big Five film studios. Columbia Pictures is a subsidiary of Japanese conglomerate Sony. Template:Section link Columbia Pictures List of TriStar Pictures films List of Screen Gems films Sony Pictures...
data.meta_site_name: The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
